pages.body:
# Bwoi

Bwoi is a music sharing platform built from the Bwoi search engine.  It is currently a work-in-progress site.

You can find Bwoi at [bwoi.bit](http://127.0.0.1:43110/bwoi.bit/).

## Features

Some of Bwoi's features include: A picture of a fucking dog and that's it.  Why?

## Developer
The creator and developer of Bwoi is LetsRaceBwoi.  His ZeroID is Bwoi.  He can be found on various other sites, such as Discord (LetsRaceBwoi) and Twitter [@LetsRaceBwoi](http://www.twitter.com/letsracebwoi/).

Ethereum is a public blockchain-based distributed computing platform, featuring smart contract functionality.[1] It provides a decentralized virtual machine, the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM), that can execute peer-to-peer contracts using a cryptocurrency called ether.

Ethereum was initially proposed in late 2013 by Vitalik Buterin, a cryptocurrency researcher and programmer. Development was funded by an online crowd sale during Julyâ€“August 2014.[2]
